name: The End of the Night
description:
By: @AshleyPringle
  • Recommended to set your browser to full screen
  • Weird interactive fiction about trying to wake up from a reccurring dream.
  • Made with twine using scans of a bunch of 35mm photos I took, which were glitched by editing the .jpgs in notepad++. Gifs were made from the photos using GifCam.
  • Just barely came in under 300 words, not counting twine commands.
  • Thanks to @kittyhorrorshow for turning me on to the text editor glitch art technique.
